description: Try our easy to follow Lemon Delicious Pudding recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Fruit pudding,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Low salt,Soy free,Tree nut free,Lemon,Mother's Day
name: Lemon Delicious Pudding Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 160Â°C. Lightly grease a 6-cup oven proof dish and place in a deep baking tray.
In a medium bowl, whisk lemon butter with egg yolks and flour until smooth. Whisk in milk gradually.
In a clean bowl, beat egg whites until soft peaks form. Add sugar and continue to beat until thick and glossy. Fold into lemon mixture.

Spoon into prepared dish. Fill baking pan with enough boiling water to come halfway up the side of the dish. Bake for 40 mins until pudding rises and is golden. Remove from pan and dust with icing sugar. Spoon into bowls to serve.
